data.lyric:
[ti:Kinfolks]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:Kinfolks]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Kinfolks - Sam Hunt
[00:04.54]Lyrics by：Zach Crowell/Josh Osborne/Jerry Flowers/Sam Hunt
[00:09.08]Composed by：Zach Crowell/Josh Osborne/Jerry Flowers/Sam Hunt
[00:13.63]I saw you going by I had to say hello
[00:16.93]I don't mean to pry but girl I gotta know
[00:19.51]What is your name
[00:21.00]How come I ain't seen you around before
[00:25.27]Tell me
[00:25.91]Now you know I ain't ever had a type having a type takes two
[00:29.53]But I know what I like and you're the only one of you
[00:32.21]You're something else
[00:33.56]D**n
[00:34.38]I know we just met but
[00:37.41]I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks to my old friends
[00:41.82]To the house in the pines where the road ends
[00:44.60]Take you to my hometown where I grew up
[00:48.22]Where I thought I knew it all before I knew what love was
[00:52.10]Gave up on it but honey you got my hopes up
[00:55.26]And I'm thinking that I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks
[01:01.99]I wanna take you home
[01:04.21]I wanna take you home not just take you home tonight
[01:07.35]Get Joanie on the phone she'll leave us on a light
[01:10.09]I wanna see the way you look up under all those stars yeah
[01:16.91]You don't need to talk word's gonna get around
[01:19.95]They'll tell you how they thought I'd never settle down
[01:22.79]Out on the porch ain't it funny the way things change
[01:27.87]I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks to my old friends
[01:32.38]To the house in the pines where the road ends
[01:35.10]Take you to my hometown where I grew up
[01:38.71]Where I thought I knew it all before I knew what love was
[01:42.66]Gave up on it but honey you got my hopes up
[01:45.78]And I'm thinking that I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks
[01:56.60]I want you tonight
[01:58.52]I don't ever wanna be without
[02:01.38]Come on
[02:02.10]I don't wanna wait around for the right time
[02:05.79]I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks to my old friends
[02:10.30]To the house in the pines where the road ends
[02:13.05]Take you to my hometown where I grew up
[02:16.54]Where I thought I knew it all before I knew what love was
[02:20.51]Gave up on it but honey you got my hopes up
[02:23.68]And I'm thinking that I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks
[02:42.64]And I'm thinking that I wanna introduce you to my kinfolks
[02:48.23]Woah
data.trans:
[ti:Kinfolks]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:Kinfolks]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.54]//
[00:09.08]//
[00:13.63]我看到你经过 必须打个招呼
[00:16.93]我不是要瞎打听 但是姑娘 我想知道
[00:19.51]你叫什么名字
[00:21.00]我怎么没见过你
[00:25.27]告诉我
[00:25.91]现在你知道 我还没有对象 恋爱是两个人的事
[00:29.53]但我知道我喜欢什么 而你是独一无二的
[00:32.21]你是与众不同的
[00:33.56]可恶
[00:34.38]我知道我们刚认识 但是
[00:37.41]我想把你介绍给我的亲人和我的老朋友
[00:41.82]带你去道路尽头松树林里的那座房子
[00:44.60]带你去我的家乡 看看我长大的地方
[00:48.22]曾经我以为自己无所不知 后来才发现爱情是我不了解的事物
[00:52.10]本来都打算放弃爱情了 但是亲爱的 你让我又燃起了希望
[00:55.26]我真的很想把你介绍给我的亲人
[01:01.99]我想带你回家
[01:04.21]我想带你回家 但不只是今晚带你回家
[01:07.35]和我妈妈Joanie打电话 她说她会为我们留一盏灯
[01:10.09]我想看你仰望星空的模样
[01:16.91]你不用开口 一切尽在不言中
[01:19.95]他们会告诉你 他们以为我永远不会安定下来
[01:22.79]坐在门口阳台上 什么都变了 是不是很奇怪
[01:27.87]我想把你介绍给我的亲人和我的老朋友
[01:32.38]带你去道路尽头松树林里的那座房子
[01:35.10]带你去我的家乡 看看我长大的地方
[01:38.71]曾经我以为自己无所不知 后来才发现爱情是我不了解的事物
[01:42.66]本来都打算放弃爱情了 但是亲爱的 你让我又燃起了希望
[01:45.78]我真的很想把你介绍给我的亲人
[01:56.60]我想要你今晚陪着我
[01:58.52]我不想没有你
[02:01.38]拜托了
[02:02.10]我不想再等待所谓的恰当的时机
[02:05.79]我想把你介绍给我的亲人和我的老朋友
[02:10.30]带你去道路尽头松树林里的那座房子
[02:13.05]带你去我的家乡 看看我长大的地方
[02:16.54]曾经我以为自己无所不知 后来才发现爱情是我不了解的事物
[02:20.51]本来都打算放弃爱情了 但是亲爱的 你让我又燃起了希望
[02:23.68]我真的很想把你介绍给我的亲人
[02:42.64]我真的很想把你介绍给我的亲人
[02:48.23]//
